title: FBS_PSE (Enum)
text:
TYPE FBS_PSE :
Definition of SF_PSE function block states and its diagnostic values.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: IDLE
rows.Comment: The function block is not active (initial state).

rows.Name: INIT
rows.Comment:
Activation is TRUE. The function block was enabled. Check if
S_StartReset is requested.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_S_PSE_IN_1
rows.Comment:
Activation is TRUE. Check if Reset is FALSE and wait for
S_PSE_In = TRUE.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_S_PSE_IN_2
rows.Comment:
Activation is TRUE. Safety demand detected. Check if Reset
is FALSE and wait for S_PSE_In = TRUE.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_RESET_1
rows.Comment:
Activation is TRUE. S_PSE_In = TRUE. Wait for rising trigger
of Reset.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_RESET_2
rows.Comment:
Activation is TRUE. S_PSE_In = TRUE. Check for S_AutoReset
or wait for rising trigger of Reset.

rows.Name: OUTPUT_ENABLED
rows.Comment:
Activation is TRUE. S_PSE_In = TRUE. Functional mode with
S_PSE_Out = TRUE.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_1
rows.Comment: Reset is TRUE while waiting for S_PSE_In = TRUE.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_2
rows.Comment: Reset is TRUE while waiting for S_PSE_In = TRUE.
